title: Pork and apple pie
description: Pork and apple is a classic flavour-combination and makes a belter of a pie. Gravy is a must for some pies, and our cider gravy is the perfect partner here. Equipment and preparation: You will need a casserole dish, a food processor and a 23cm/9in spring form cake tin.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4 oz boneless, rindless pork shoulder, cut into 3cm/1¼in chunks
3 medium onions, about 300g/10½oz total weight, halved and sliced
400g/14oz Bramley cooking apples, peeled, cored, quartered and cut into 2cm/¾in chunks
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz plain flour, plus extra for flouring
1 large free-range egg, beaten with 1 tbsp of cold water
